firmDetails.name: Chetluru Srinivas & Associates
firmDetails.tagline: Expert Legal Counsel You Can Trust
firmDetails.description: Chetluru Srinivas and Associates began its journey in 1991 and has been successfully operating in the legal field for over 35 years. The firm is a team of dedicated and intellectual professionals with expertise across various areas of law in India. Notably, the firm specializes in corporate law, land laws, civil disputes, criminal cases, including those under the Negotiable Instruments Act, Consumer Protection Act, Provident Fund Act, and matrimonial disputes.

practiceAreas.name: Civil Law
practiceAreas.description: Comprehensive civil law services including land litigation, land acquisition, declaration suits, and partition suits. Our experienced team handles complex civil matters with expertise and dedication.

practiceAreas.name: Criminal Cases
practiceAreas.description: Expert criminal defense representation across all levels of courts. We handle serious criminal matters including CBI cases, PMLA violations, and criminal appeals with strategic defense approaches.

practiceAreas.name: Corporate Law
practiceAreas.description: Comprehensive corporate legal services for businesses of all sizes. From company formation to complex corporate restructuring, we provide strategic legal counsel for corporate matters.

practiceAreas.name: Matrimonial Disputes
practiceAreas.description: Sensitive and expert handling of family law matters with focus on amicable resolution. We provide compassionate legal support during difficult personal circumstances.

practiceAreas.name: Banking and Finance
practiceAreas.description: Specialized legal services for banking and financial sector disputes. We represent both financial institutions and borrowers in debt recovery and banking law matters.

practiceAreas.name: Arbitration
practiceAreas.description: Expert legal representation and consultation in arbitration proceedings. We provide strategic counsel for both domestic and international arbitration matters.

practiceAreas.name: Consumer Protection Cases
practiceAreas.description: Expert legal representation and consultation in consumer protection cases. We fight for consumer rights and fair business practices.

practiceAreas.name: Intellectual Property
practiceAreas.description: Comprehensive intellectual property services including patent prosecution, trademark registration, and IP litigation. Our registered patent agent provides expert IP counsel.

practiceAreas.name: Negotiable Instruments
practiceAreas.description: Expert handling of negotiable instruments cases including dishonor of cheques and payment system disputes.
services: Payment and Settlement Systems Act matters

advocates.name: Chetluru Srinivas
advocates.title: Founder & Senior Advocate
advocates.bio: Chetluru Srinivas is the founder and senior advocate of the firm, bringing over 35 years of extensive legal experience. Having established the practice in 1991, he has built a reputation for exceptional legal acumen and strategic case handling. His expertise spans corporate law and civil litigation, with particular strength in High Court practice under both original and appellate jurisdictions. Mr. Srinivas is known for his transparent approach to client counseling and his commitment to achieving favorable outcomes through both litigation and out-of-court settlements.

advocates.name: Kiran Kumar Tirunahari
advocates.title: Senior Associate
advocates.bio: Kiran Kumar Tirunahari is a senior associate with over 25 years of legal practice experience. He brings deep expertise in both civil and criminal law matters, providing comprehensive legal solutions to clients. His extensive experience in litigation management and legal research makes him an invaluable asset to the firm's practice. Mr. Tirunahari is known for his meticulous attention to detail and strategic approach to complex legal matters.

advocates.name: Vijaya Saradhi Penubarthi
advocates.title: Advocate
advocates.bio: Vijaya Saradhi Penubarthi is an experienced advocate with over 23 years of practice in civil, criminal, and family law. He specializes in handling sensitive matrimonial disputes and family law matters with a compassionate yet strategic approach. His expertise in civil and criminal law allows him to provide comprehensive legal representation across diverse legal challenges. Mr. Saradhi is particularly known for his ability to handle complex disputes with sensitivity and professional excellence.

advocates.name: Yajur Putta
advocates.title: Advocate
advocates.bio: Yajur Putta brings a unique combination of legal and business expertise to the firm with over 6 years of practice experience. His educational background in both law and business administration provides him with a comprehensive understanding of corporate and commercial legal matters. Mr. Putta specializes in corporate law, business law, and commercial litigation, offering clients strategic legal counsel that considers both legal and business implications of their decisions.

advocates.name: K.S.Kushal
advocates.title: Advocate
education: Post Graduate Diploma in Intellectual Property Rights
advocates.bio: K.S. Kushal is a dynamic advocate with over 4 years of experience and specialized expertise in intellectual property rights. His post-graduate diploma in IPR, combined with his legal degree, makes him particularly valuable for clients seeking protection and enforcement of their intellectual property assets. Mr. Kushal's practice encompasses corporate law, commercial law, and legal research, bringing fresh perspectives and innovative approaches to complex legal challenges.

advocates.name: Challa Vimalanand
advocates.title: IP Law Specialist, Advocate & Patent Agent
advocates.bio: Challa Vimalanand is a registered Patent Agent (IN/PA 6235) and intellectual property law specialist with over 12 years of industry experience. His unique combination of technical and legal expertise makes him exceptionally qualified to handle complex intellectual property matters. Mr. Vimalanand specializes in patent prosecution, trademark registration, and comprehensive IP portfolio management. His technical background enables him to understand complex innovations and provide strategic IP counsel to inventors, startups, and established corporations.

testimonials.quote: Chetluru Srinivas handled my property dispute with exceptional professionalism. Their thorough understanding of civil law and strategic approach led to a favorable settlement that exceeded my expectations.
The team's expertise in corporate law helped us navigate complex regulatory requirements seamlessly. Their strategic guidance was invaluable for our business expansion.
Professional, knowledgeable, and compassionate. They handled my family law matter with sensitivity while achieving the best possible outcome for my case.
